newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Budapest bourse to introduce 12-mo T-bill futures.
newsitem.headline: Budapest bourse to introduce 12-mo T-bill futures.

text.p: The Budapest Stock Exchange (BSE) will introduce futures contracts for 12-month discount treasury bills on October 11, the BSE said on Friday.
With the launch of the new 12-month discount T-bills the BSE will increase the number of traded instruments in its futures section to eight.
The bourse also offers futures contracts for the BUX index, three-month discount Treasury bills, dollar, mark and ECU, and the one- and three-month Budapest Interbank Offered Rate (BUBOR).
The BSE also said Postabank Securities was chosen as specialist market maker for the 12-month discount papers until October 31, 1997.
